instructions:
In a Dutch oven sauté the onions in 1 1/2 tbsp vegetable oil for 5 minutes. Add minced garlic and
continue cooking onions until transparent. Remove onions with slotted spoon and set aside. Dredge short
ribs in seasoned flour, add remaining oil and brown ribs on all sides. Remove and save with onions.
Remove excess fat and deglaze with water over high heat. Return ribs, half of the onions, Worcestershire
sauce, A-1 sauce, and chili sauce. Add beef broth to make about 1/2 inch liquid in Dutch oven. Cover and
simmer gently for 1 1/2 to 2 hours or until tender. Add beef
broth as needed during simmering. Remove meat and onions from Dutch oven and keep warm. Skim off
excess fat, add remaining beef broth and make gravy with a flour and water mixture. *(Add prepared gravy
mix if more gravy is desired.)* Return ribs and remaining onions and cook gently for about 5 minutes. Serve
with noodles. Serves 6. 
*(Rev. 2/11/92)*
ingredients: 1 pkg. McCormick’s brown gravy mix, prepared (optional)
name: Short Ribs
